cyclone.name: PHILIPPE
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking northwest through Monday, then turning north on Tuesday, passing just northeast of the northern Leeward Islands and moving into the open Atlantic toward the vicinity of Bermuda later in the week
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Near or just northeast of the northern Leeward Islands (Antigua/Barbuda area)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands, Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico (swells and rain bands)
weather_observation.wind: Gusty squalls possible; probability of sustained tropical-storm-force winds is very low (≤5%).
weather_observation.rainfall: Bands of heavy showers could produce 1–3 inches of rain with isolated higher pockets, leading to brief street flooding.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along north and east–facing beaches.
